entries.journal_entry_description: On the planet of Mustafar you have been approached by some sort of spirit. This being has tasked you with destroying a powerful force crystal before it falls in to the hands of evil.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You need to find a way to access the Mustafarian droid mainframe and hope that one of their droids have spotted the hermit travelling the lands recently.
entries.task01_item_name: Inputting mainframe search command. Function started
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've managed to gain access to the mainframe, go over the records and try to find a lead on the whereabouts of the crazed hermit.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The mainframe is searching for thousands of hours of records trying to find a match, give it some time.
entries.task03_item_name: Search results have been located. Function completed
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The search is complete, check results on the mainframe terminal.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: One of the Mustafarian survey droids spotted someone that fits with the hermit less than an hour ago. You need to quickly head to these coordinates and see if he's still in the area.
entries.task06_message_box_text: All of a sudden you hear a bone chilling wail and two fierce looking Blistmoks come charging at you!
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: You've spotted the hermit. Try to convince him to give you the crystal shard.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You've managed to convince the hermit to give you the key. If the hermit is any indication though, you better not keep it for long.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: From the corpse of the old Hermit, you loot what Ben thought would work as the key.
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: You've spotted the hermit. Try to convince him to give you the crystal shard.
entries.task15_journal_entry_description: Search the nearby area, maybe he hasn't made it too far.
entries.task15_message_box_text: Search the nearby area, maybe he hasn't made it too far.
